headline: Johnson Controls to present at the Citi's 2025 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI), the global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, will present at Citi's 2025 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference in Miami Beach, Florida. Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Marc Vandiepenbeeck, will participate on Thursday, Feb. 20, 2025, at 9:40 a.m. EST.

headline: Johnson Controls to present at the Barclays 42nd Annual Industrial Select Conference
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI), the global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, will present at the Barclays 42nd Annual Industrial Select Conference in Miami Beach, Florida. Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Marc Vandiepenbeeck, will participate on Thursday, Feb. 20, 2025, at 11:35 a.m. EST.

headline: Johnson Controls’ North American orders grew 18% in first quarter
summary: Demand across data centers, healthcare, and industrial and manufacturing helped the company’s backlog reach $13.2 billion.

headline: Why Johnson Controls International PLC (JCI) Went Up on Wednesday
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Companies Jump on Better Earnings, Outlook. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Johnson Controls International PLC (NYSE:JCI) stands against the other stocks. The stock market extended its winning streak on Wednesday, closing firmer as investors seemed to have already priced in the […]
